channel.title: Need help with opening client
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm experiencing a problem with the client, on my computer it opens up fine but when my friends download it and try to open it, it brings up a message in the cmd "java not recognized" and the client doesn't even open up. Now some of you are going to say, tell them to install jdk but the thing is, I can't make everyone who download my client install jdk, I used to download clients and play servers and worked with no problems when I didn't even have jdk installed. So what's wrong with my client?
Thanks!
Also, here's what's in the bat file that opens the client:
@echo off Title Color 1 java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui pause
That works fine for me but not for the other people that tried my client.

item.title: Need help with opening client
item.dc:creator: @justus69 justus69
item.description:
@justus69 wrote:

Guessing you have java installed but meow.
use This
Or replace that jre7 with jdk blaablaablaa you know the drill
@echo off
Title
Color 1
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with opening client
item.dc:creator: @Blawan Blawan
item.description:
@Blawan wrote:

Hello,

I’m experiencing a problem with the client, on my computer it opens up fine but when my friends download it and try to open it, it brings up a message in the cmd “java not recognized” and the client doesn’t even open up. Now some of you are going to say, tell them to install jdk but the thing is, I can’t make everyone who download my client install jdk, I used to download clients and play servers and worked with no problems when I didn’t even have jdk installed. So what’s wrong with my client?

Thanks!

Also, here’s what’s in the bat file that opens the client:

Title
Color 1
java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
pause

That works fine for me but not for the other people that tried my client.
